activities: Client Associated Businesses, Inc. (CAB) and it's affiliates provides data management services to pharmaceutical and biotechnology company clients on a global basis.  In conducting these services, CAB processes data relating to research study participants, study investigators, and customers.  Data relating to research study participants is always blinded to CAB.  Because of the global nature of CAB's clients and their research studies generating the data processed by CAB, CAB may recieve and send personal data to members of the European Union.
personaldata: On-Line, Off Line, manually processed da
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
